body: Niara de Oliveira, at her blog Pimenta com Limão [Pepper with Lemon, pt], honors the  memory of the French feminist Simone de Beauvoir, born on January 9, 1908. Niara also shares links to download one of Beauvoir's most famous books, "The Second Sex".
original_body: Niara de Oliveira, at her blog Pimenta com Limão [Pepper with Lemon, pt], honors the memory of the French feminist Simone de Beauvoir, born on January 9, 1908. Niara also shares links to download one of Beauvoir's most famous books, "The Second Sex".
title: Brazil: The Second Sex
